table_definition.name: resourcespecsfact_by_
table_definition.comment: Resource specifications aggregate table by day

columns.name: ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The id related to modw.${AGGREGATION_UNIT}s.

columns.name: year
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The year of the ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}

columns.name: ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The ${AGGREGATION_UNIT} of the year.

columns.name: record_resource_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The resource the specification is for.

columns.name: total_cpu_cores
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU cores available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_cpu_cores
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU cores available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_gpu_cores
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU cores aavailable to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_gpu_cores
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU cores aavailable to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_cpu_nodes
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU nodes available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_cpu_nodes
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU nodes available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_gpu_nodes
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU nodes available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_gpu_nodes
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU nodes available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_core_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU core seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_core_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU core seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_gpu_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU core seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_gpu_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU core seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_cpu_node_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU node seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_cpu_node_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of CPU node seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: total_gpu_node_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU node seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: allocated_gpu_node_time
columns.comment: FACT: Number of GPU node seconds available to be allocated through ${ORGANIZATION_NAME} during a time period

columns.name: su_available
columns.comment: FACT: Total number of SU's available for a time period

columns.name: resource_allocation_type_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Allocation type for the resource

columns.name: resource_organization_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Organization the resource belongs to

columns.name: resource_state_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Geographical state of the organization to which the resource belongs

columns.name: resource_country_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Country of the organization to which the resource belongs

columns.name: organizationtype_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The type of organization the resource belongs to

columns.name: resourcetype_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The type of resource this is

columns.name: resourcespecs_id_list
columns.comment: METADATA: the ids in the fact table for the rows that went into this row
